488930.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Reloaded: Grim Prairie Tales
488930.description:
Deadlands Reloaded: Grim Prairie Tales

Savage Worlds Adventures for Fantasy Grounds II
The Weird West is full of grim and twisted trails, where the boogeyman isnt just a story parents tell misbehaving children.
Grim Prairie Trails rounds up 19 of these horrors. Best of all, each monster includes a full Savage Tale so it wont take long to get on the trail. Best mind whats lurkin around the next bend, amigo!
Grim Prairie Trails is not a complete game. Its a supplement for the Deadlands setting for the Savage Worlds game system.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software, the Savage Worlds
Ruleset and the Deadlands Reloaded Setting for Fantasy Grounds
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Ben Turner
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Aki Heikkinen
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
